item.title: 黄金价格为何反映长期趋势转变
item.description:
世界黄金协会策略师约翰·里德阐释了正在将黄金转变为首选避风港的完美风暴。【原文：

World Gold Council strategist John Reade explains the perfect storm that’s turning gold into a preferred safe haven.

】

item.title: 英国央行料将维持利率不变，关注英国就业下滑态势
item.description: 英国央行本周预计将维持利率在3.75%不变，因决策者正权衡相互矛盾的经济信号——经济在增强的同时就业岗位却在减少，失业率已逼近五年高位。【原文：The Bank of England is expected to keep interest rates on hold at 3.75% this week as policymakers weigh contradictory signs that the economy is both strengthening and losing jobs with unemployment at a near five-year high.】

item.title: 金银跌势延续，市场震荡加剧
资产管理公司One预计日元将升值至150，因4月加息预期
item.description: 瑞穗金融集团首席投资官村松茂树表示，该集团资产管理部门预计，在日本央行4月加息后，日元兑美元汇率将升至150日元以上。【原文：Mizuho Financial Group Inc.’s asset management unit expects the yen to strengthen beyond 150 per dollar after an April rate hike by the Bank of Japan, said Shigeki Muramatsu, the firm’s chief investment officer.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮推动台湾在亚洲新兴市场股票基准指数中超越中国
item.description: 在人工智能股的强劲上涨推动下，台湾地区首次在近二十年间超越中国大陆，成为某关键新兴市场股票指数中权重最高的地区市场。【原文：Taiwan has overtaken China as the market with the top weighting in a key emerging-markets stock index for the first time in nearly two decades, driven by a rally in artificial-intelligence shares.】

item.title: 中国聚焦习近平旧演讲谈风险与强势货币
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平在官方刊物中重申的遏制金融风险、建设具有全球储备地位的强大货币的承诺，正推动市场对人民币国际化进程加速的预期。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping’s pledge to curb financial risks and build a powerful currency with global reserve status, reiterated in a state publication, is boosting expectations of an accelerated push for yuan internationalization.】

item.title: 韩国股市因利率不确定性及人工智能支出问题下跌
item.description: 韩国股市大幅下挫，因利率前景的不确定性及对人工智能相关支出可持续性的担忧冲击科技股。【原文：South Korean stocks slumped, as uncertainty over the outlook for interest rates and concerns about the sustainability of AI-related spending hit technology shares.】

item.title: 新加坡成立航天局，全球航天产业蓬勃发展
item.description: 新加坡正着手组建自己的航天机构，试图在全球航天产业中分得一杯羹。该产业预计在不到十年的时间内将达到1.8万亿美元的规模。【原文：Singapore is forming its own space agency in an attempt to carve out a slice of a global industry projected to be worth $1.8 trillion in less than a decade.】

item.title: 交易税大幅上调，金银抛售加剧印度股市黯淡前景
item.description: Nifty 50指数创下六年预算日最差表现。【原文：Nifty 50 posts its worst budget-day performance in six years.】

item.title: 墨西哥将继续进行外交谈判，以维持对古巴的石油供应
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅·谢恩鲍姆表示，在特朗普总统威胁采取报复性关税措施后，墨西哥将继续通过外交渠道基于人道主义理由向古巴输送石油，"不寻求对抗"。【原文：Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum said her country will continue to pursue diplomatic channels to keep sending oil to Cuba on humanitarian grounds “without seeking confrontation,” after US President Donald Trump threatened retaliatory tariffs.】

item.title: 日本加速推进深海采矿计划以减少对稀土依赖
item.description: 日本正加速推进一项实施十年的计划，旨在从深海海底提取稀土元素。这项雄心勃勃的举措因该国减少对中国供应依赖的努力而获得额外推动力。【原文：Japan is accelerating a decade-old plan to extract rare earths from the deep seabed, an ambitious initiative given extra impetus by the country’s drive to cut reliance on Chinese supply.】

item.title: 万科创纪录亏损，开发商受制于国家支持者
item.description: 万科集团创纪录的120亿美元亏损凸显出，这家陷入困境的房地产开发商能否避免违约，取决于其国有股东愿意提供多少支持。【原文：China Vanke Co.’s $12 billion record loss underscores how its ability to avoid default depends on how far its state shareholder is willing to support the stricken property developer.】

item.title: 中国出口导向型企业制造业活动指标扩张
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，中国1月份制造业活动有所改善，这对持续放缓的经济而言实属难得的积极信号。【原文：China’s manufacturing activity improved in January, according to a private survey, a rare encouraging sign for an economy that’s been losing momentum.】

item.title: 日本央行摘要显示及时加息迫在眉睫
item.description: 日本央行1月政策会议意见摘要显示，随着当局密切关注日元疲软对通胀的影响，市场对及时加息必要性的认识日益增强。【原文：A summary of opinions from the Bank of Japan’s January policy meeting indicated a growing awareness of the need to raise interest rates in a timely fashion as authorities monitor the impact of the weak yen on inflation.】

item.title: 印尼股市因大宗商品价格走弱再度下跌
item.description: 印尼股市周一再度遭遇抛售，大宗商品价格走软拖累市场走势，使监管机构提振东南亚最大股市信心的努力面临挑战。【原文：Indonesian stocks resumed their selloff Monday, weighed by weaker commodity prices, complicating efforts by regulators to shore up confidence in Southeast Asia’s biggest equities market.】

item.title: 铜价跌势加剧，中国贸易商暂退观望
item.description: 铜价在周五大幅下跌后继续走低，交易员们正权衡金属市场经历数日动荡后的下一步走势——此前中国市场掀起的买盘与抛盘浪潮推动了金属市场的剧烈波动。【原文：Copper fell further, after steep losses on Friday, as traders mulled what’s next after a tumultuous few days for metals markets fueled by waves of buying and selling in China.】

item.title: 交易员抛售美元之际，沃什当选引发反弹
item.description: 就在凯文·沃什被提名为美联储主席的消息引发美元自5月以来最大涨幅的前几天，资产管理公司加大了看跌美元的头寸。【原文：Asset managers boosted their bearish dollar positioning just days before news of Kevin Warsh’s nomination as Federal Reserve chair triggered the greenback’s biggest gain since May.】

item.title: 金属交易商损失至少1.44亿美元，"帽子"逃离中国
item.description: 知情人士透露，中国金属贸易商因交易对手逃离国内导致交易未完成，累计亏损至少10亿元人民币（约合1.44亿美元），引发监管机构对潜在金融风险的担忧。【原文：Chinese metals traders have racked up losses totaling at least 1 billion yuan ($144 million) after one of their counterparties fled the country leaving deals unfinished, alarming top regulators worried about hidden financial risks, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易员为印度创纪录的借贷计划可能导致债券亏损而做准备
item.description: 市场参与者表示，由于政府计划发行规模空前且超出预期的债券，叠加需求疲软带来的压力，印度债券周一料将遭遇下跌。【原文：Indian bonds look set to suffer losses on Monday as the government’s plan to sell an unprecedented and more-than-expected amount of debt adds to pressure from weakening demand, market participants said.】

item.title: 美国天然气价格暴跌，因天气预报显示气温将回升
item.description: 美国天然气期货价格暴跌，抹去了周五的涨幅，因近期天气预报显示气温将趋于温和。【原文：US natural gas futures plummeted, erasing Friday’s surge, as near-term weather forecasts showed milder conditions.】

item.title: 印度预算案意外增税令投资者失望
item.description: 分析师和基金经理指出，印度政府在预算提案中提议提高股票衍生品交易税，却未采取措施立即遏制资金外流，这将在短期内对国内股市构成压力。【原文：The Indian government’s budget proposal to increase taxes on equity derivatives trading without providing measures to immediately stem foreign outflows is set to pressure domestic shares in the near-term, according to analysts and fund managers.】

item.title: Lasertec股价下跌，因业绩展望未达市场预期
item.description: Lasertec公司股价暴跌10%，此前该公司上调业绩预期，但涨幅低于投资者预期，尽管人工智能相关支出激增。【原文：Lasertec Corp.’s stock price plunged 10% after the company raised its outlook less than investors had anticipated in the face of an AI-related surge in spending.】

item.title: 野村证券股价下跌，因利润降幅超出预期
item.description: 野村控股公司股价下跌，因其上一季度利润下滑幅度超出分析师预期，主要源于欧洲业务亏损及重大收购相关的一次性成本。【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. shares fell after profit dropped more than analysts anticipated last quarter, due to a loss in Europe and one-time costs tied to a major acquisition.】

item.title: 印尼股市下跌，外国投资者抛售印尼主权债务
item.description: 上周印尼股市暴跌蔓延至主权债券市场，外国投资者抛售债券与股票同步。【原文：Indonesia’s stock-market rout spilled into sovereign bonds last week as foreign investors dumped debt alongside equities.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟收购案使奈飞成为监管机构的关注焦点
item.description: Netflix长期以来在规避监管纠葛方面表现出色。这种局面即将改变。【原文：Netflix has long excelled at avoiding regulatory entanglements. That’s about to change.】

item.title: 中国如何利用"国家队"影响交易
item.description: 中国股市长期以来波动性远超北京当局的预期，随着政府试图将经济增长重心从房地产和债务转向科技与创新，这一问题变得更为紧迫。在经济压力加剧且与美国战略竞争激烈的当下，市场日益期待股市能助力企业融资、支撑家庭资产负债表并提振信心。【原文：China’s stock market has long been more volatile than Beijing would like, a problem that has taken on greater urgency as the government tries to shift growth away from property and debt and toward technology and innovation. Equities are increasingly expected to help fund companies, support household balance sheets and reinforce confidence at a time of intensifying economic pressure and strategic rivalry with the US.】

item.title: 中国人工智能交易推动香港上市迎来今年最繁忙开局
item.description: 香港新盘开年首周的销售热度前所未有。【原文：It has never been this busy at the start of a year for new listings in Hong Kong.】

item.title: 泰国大选交易指南：领导人承诺推出刺激计划
item.description: 随着泰国大选临近，股市持续走高，投资者最关注的是泰国政府能否更清晰地阐明支出计划及支持经济增长的措施。【原文：Greater clarity on Thailand’s spending plans and measures to support growth are at the top of investors’ list as the country heads into a general election amid gains in the stock market.】

item.title: 金价延续逾十年最大跌幅，涨势戛然而止
item.description: 金价下跌，延续了十多年来最大跌幅，贵金属从创纪录的涨势中回调，此前涨势过猛过快。白银价格也大幅下挫。【原文：Gold fell, extending its biggest plunge in more than a decade, as precious metals snapped back from a record-breaking rally that had run too far, too fast. Silver also slumped.】

item.title: 日元下跌，因高市裕之言论冷却干预猜测
item.description: 日本首相高市早苗表示，日元贬值对出口行业而言可能是一个重大机遇，此言令市场对日本政府即将出手干预支撑日元的猜测降温，日元汇率应声下跌。【原文：The yen slid after Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi said a weak currency can be a major opportunity for export industries, cooling speculation that her government is poised to intervene to support the yen.】
